pr_title: Shenshengli hbase-25450 The parameter "hbase.bucketcache.size" is misdescribed

timeline.bodyText: Did we remove the percentage facility? i.e. if < 1, the bucket cache is a percentage of heap? We only do hard size in MBs now?
timeline.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText: From the code and the test results, yes.
replies.author: shenshengli

replies.bodyText: Yes Stack.  The bucket cache size can only be specified as absolute MBs value.  we no longer support on heap Bucket cache and so size as % of heap.  And min value for this is 1. (1 MB)
replies.author: anoopsjohn
